DOC.brief_summary: The Healthy Environments Partnership establish October 2000 , part National Institute Environmental Health Sciences “ Health Disparities Initiative. ” The Healthy Environments Partnership seek expand knowledge base social economic inequality link disparity cardiovascular health among resident Detroit . The Healthy Environments Partnership project Detroit Community-Academic Urban Research Center . The partner : Brightmoor Community Center , Butzel Family Center , Detroit Health Department , Friends Parkside , Henry Ford Health System , Southwest Counseling Development Services , Southwest Detroit Environmental Vision University Detroit Mercy University Michigan School Public Health , School Nursing , Institute Social Research .
DOC.criteria: Age 25 older Resident three designate area Detroit , MI
